author: Z.B. Steele
description:
Sanderson’s Mistborn: the Final Empire is a stand-out work amidst the genre as a whole. Wielding some impressive world-building, a nice revenge/heist plot, and the coolest magic system I’ve ever seen, Mistborn: the Final Empire is not only a legitimate classic, it’s one of the essential works in the genre.  “Men rarely see their own […]

The post REVIEW: Mistborn: the Final Empire by Brandon Sanderson appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Mistborn: the Final Empire by Brandon Sanderson
